defaultTasks.title: Use reusable bags for shopping
defaultTasks.description: Take reusable bags for shopping to reduce plastic waste.

defaultTasks.title: Turn off lights when leaving a room
defaultTasks.description: Make it a habit to turn off lights when you leave a room to save energy.

defaultTasks.title: Organize trash properly
defaultTasks.description: Ensure all waste is sorted into the correct recycling compartments. This will help reduce waste and save the environment.

defaultTasks.title: Unplug unnecessary devices before bed
defaultTasks.description: Disconnect TVs, chargers, and other devices from power when not in use. This will save energy and reduce your electricity bill.

defaultTasks.title: Carry reusable items
defaultTasks.description: Carry reusable items such as water bottles, coffee cups, and cutlery to reduce waste.

defaultTasks.title: Limit water usage
defaultTasks.description: Turn off the tap while brushing teeth or washing dishes. This will help save water and reduce your water bill.

defaultTasks.title: Take shorter showers
defaultTasks.description: Take shorter showers to save water and energy. This will further help reduce your water and heating bills.

defaultTasks.title: Plan meals around leftovers
defaultTasks.description: Plan meals around leftovers to reduce food waste. This will help save money and reduce the amount of food that goes to waste.

defaultTasks.title: Layer up instead of turning up the heat
defaultTasks.description: Layer up with warm clothing instead of turning up the heat. This will save energy and reduce your heating bill.

defaultTasks.title: Use eco-mode on appliances
defaultTasks.description: Always run your washing machine and dishwasher on eco mode. This will significantly reduce energy consumption in the long run.

defaultTasks.title: Eat a purely plant-based diet
defaultTasks.description: Animal agriculture is a leading cause of deforestation, water pollution, and greenhouse gas emissions. Reducing meat consumption can help reduce your carbon footprint.

defaultTasks.title: Opt for public transport instead of driving
defaultTasks.description: Using public transport instead of driving can help reduce greenhouse gas emissions and traffic congestion.

defaultTasks.title: Replace any your old lightbulbs with LED
defaultTasks.description: Reduces energy consumption by up to 75% compared to traditional bulbs and lasts significantly longer, lowering waste.

defaultTasks.title: Switch to renewable energy
defaultTasks.description: Switching to a renewable energy provider to will significantly reduce your carbon footprint and support clean energy.

defaultTasks.title: Upgrade to energy-efficient appliances
defaultTasks.description: Upgrading to energy-efficient appliances with Energy Star ratings will save you money on your energy bills and reduce your carbon footprint.
